name: Thatch
text: If this character were to be KOD, or removed from play by your opponents effect, you may instead place this character into the trash, and then draw one card.

effect.text: If this character were to be KOD, or removed from play by your opponents effect, you may instead place this character into the trash, and then draw one card.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has 'US' rarity, which is not standard in One Piece TCG. Assuming 'US' is a misprint or placeholder for 'UC' or similar.
